Key Match Events: Buddy Hield scored 19 points in the fourth quarter
Lindy Waters scored 17 points in his first 17 minutes of action
The Warriors scored 40 points in the third quarter, outscoring the Pelicans by a combined 25 points over the second and third quarters
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dubs had a 36-point advantage from behind the arc, sinking 21 3-pointers compared to just nine for the Pelicans
The Warriors acquired the sharpshooting guard Lindy Waters from the Oklahoma City Thunder this offseason
Buddy Hield ranks second in the league in made 3-pointers this season (20), just two shy of Minnesota Timberwolves guard Anthony Edwards (22)
Others: The Warriors will face these same New Orleans Pelicans on the second night of a back-to-back at Chase Center on Wednesday (7 p.m. PST)
